summary: This bill, the PROTECT Our Children Reauthorization Act of 2025, aims to reauthorize and amend the PROTECT Our Children Act of 2008. It focuses on combating child exploitation by reauthorizing the National Strategy for Child Exploitation Prevention and Interdiction, strengthening the National Internet Crimes Against Children (ICAC) Task Force Program, and increasing funding for related programs. The bill includes provisions for data analysis, training, and coordination between various agencies to address child exploitation, including provisions regarding internet crimes . It also amends reporting requirements for providers. The bill increases funding allocations for the program for fiscal years 2026-2028.
